entry.title: Mahogany Cedar 16 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 16 oz Candle
Price: 26.60

Only available in limited quantities while supplies last! Once it's gone, it's gone.

Mahogany Cedar is a soothing aroma of warm mahogany with crisp citrus and sweet juniper berries, highlighted by red cedar, fresh fir, and rich clove, with soft notes of oakmoss and sandalwood.

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time. This earthy and fresh fragrance features a moderate strength that captures the experience of a soothing walk through the woods with the warm, soft embrace of natural beauty and good company.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

entry.title: Pumpkin Bread Soy Wax Melt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 12.60

Selling out for the season, and going fast! This scent will not return until next year.

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Pumpkin Bread is a warm aroma of pumpkin pie spice, cinnamon, and brown sugar in sweet, freshly baked pumpkin bread, highlighted by rich caramel and topped with vanilla buttercream. With just 6-12 wax cubes in your warmer, this bakey fragrance features a moderate strength that smells (almost) good enough to eat—it’ll gather your whole family to the kitchen for a slice of sweet, delicious pumpkin treat.

The 4 oz Soy Wax Melts bag includes approximately 55 cubes for up to 65 hours to total fragrance burn time.

All our melts are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting burn every time. We use premium fragrance oils hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.! All melts are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.

WEIGHTS: 4.0 oz (113.4 g)
DIMENSIONS: 6.25" x 5.75"

Enjoy more Pumpkin fragrances.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 16 oz Candle
Price: 22.80

Only available while supplies last! Once it's gone, it's gone for good.

Pumpkin Spice Latte is a spiced medley of cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove intertwined with a warm and soothing blend of sweet pumpkin, rich maple, and vanilla cream in freshly brewed espresso. 

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time. This  spiced and bakey fragrance features a moderate scent that is truly the classic of the season with all the best, cozy smells of a PSL, without the line at the coffee shop.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.
